title: Opinion: When a doctor can’t heal his friends
description: “Medicine taught me how to treat disease, not how to sit with suffering”: A doctor reflects on what he learned from the loss of two friends.
content: “Medicine taught me how to treat disease, not how to sit with suffering”: A doctor reflects on what he learned from the loss of two friends.
